name: Icy Fall
description:
Icy Fall is a competitive game where the goal is to throw your opponent out of the map.

To help you, each round you can pick guns, tools or boots with special abilities.

But be careful, the maps are made entirely made of frail ice. 

One wrong move could make you lose.

This game was made during McGill's McGameJam 2020 by Maxime Charland, Roxanne Corbeil, Alexis Maher et Samuel Trottier.

Credit : 

https://www.kenney.nl/ for some assets

Epic Toon FX for some FX

Thank you to John Barry for some custom made assets
